actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to improve the Federal medical assistance percentage used under the medicaid program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fairness in Medicaid Funding Act of 1991

summary.text: Fairness in Medicaid Funding Act of 1991 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to change the Federal medical assistance percentage used under the Medicaid program. Bases payments to the States for administration costs on the Federal medical assistance percentage.

titles.title: Fairness in Medicaid Funding Act of 1991
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to improve the Federal medical assistance percentage used under the medicaid program, and for other purposes.
